thread.title: Megan Park, Tyler Hilton marry
thread.title_full: Megan Park, Tyler Hilton marry - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Megan Park, Tyler Hilton marry
text:
Almost a year after their engagement, Tyler Hilton and Megan Park have tied the knot.
The former co-stars exchanged vows in front of family and friends in Malibu Canyon, California on Saturday, reported Us Weekly.
"It was everything we wanted it to be and it was so nice after so many years together to finally celebrate our relationship with all of our friends and family," Park, 29, said.
"It's nice to have everyone we love in one place finally for all these years to celebrate our love for each other."
They had fall as theme of the wedding. There was no bridesmaids or groomsmen.
The ceremony took place inside the Triunfo Creek Vineyards and the reception was held outdoors with a food truck, a bluegrass band, and ping-pong tables on set.
Park and Hilton met on the set of Charlie Bartlett in 2006. They announced the engagement in January this year. He proposed to her using a family heirloom, his great-grandmother's ring.
